pages.text: $(li)The Turtle Shell is a quiet better of $(l:patchouli:armors/wood_armor)Wood Helmet$(/l), Leather Helmet and $(l:patchouli:armors/snow_armor)Snow Helmet$(/l).$(br)$(li)This helmet doesn't give to you any special effect.$(br)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:armors/spiked_turtle_shell)Spike Turtle Shell$(/l).
